articles.content: As the kickoff of the 2024 awards season, the 81st Golden Globe Awards at the Beverly Hilton exuded a decidedly festive vibe, not only from the trophies and speeches, but also the high style on the r… [+6734 chars]

articles.title: Larry David Is Still the Worst in Final Season Trailer for ‘Curb Your Enthusiasm’ - Rolling Stone
articles.description: Larry David remains is hilarious, terrible, misanthropic self in the new trailer for the final season of 'Curb Your Enthusiasm.'
articles.content:
Larry David is back for one last blast of hilarious, unrepentant misanthropy in the official trailer for the final season of Curb Your Enthusiasm.
